translations: 目录，目录册；一系列，一连串（坏事情）；<美>大学情况一览
列入目录，编入目录；列举，记载

sentences.sentence: An illustrated catalogue accompanies the exhibition.
We will be forwarding you our new catalogue next week.
sentences.translation: 我们将于下星期给你寄上新的商品目录。

sentences.sentence: The catalogue gives a full description of each product.
sentences.translation: 该目录对每一种产品都作了详尽的说明。
